title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Advancing Patient and Business Operations Insights with Gen AI (IND212)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用生成式AI推进患者和业务运营洞察 (IND212)
abstract: Discover how Huron is using generative AI to transform patient satisfaction and revenue cycle analytics. Harnessing the power of AWS Bedrock, Amazon Nova LLM, and Amazon Redshift in diverse areas of healthcare analytics, Huron is achieving 90% accuracy in real-time sentiment analysis and proactively diagnosing opportunities for revenue cycle improvement. Learn how their solution drives hospital revenue through improved funding and staff coaching, successfully scaling to over 100 healthcare providers. Discover practical insights for integrating AWS AI services to transform patient experience measurement and achieve immediate business impact in healthcare operations.
abstract_cn: 了解Huron如何利用生成式AI转变患者满意度和收入周期分析。通过在医疗分析的多个领域中运用AWS Bedrock、Amazon Nova LLM和Amazon Redshift的强大功能，Huron在实时情感分析中实现了90%的准确率，并主动诊断收入周期改进机会。了解他们的解决方案如何通过改善资金和员工培训来推动医院收入，成功扩展到100多家医疗服务提供商。探索集成AWS AI服务的实用见解，以转变患者体验测量并在医疗运营中实现即时业务影响。
